If I have two tabs open showing the same folder, but with different views, on a restart they come back both showing the same view.


Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open a folder
2. Choose a view for it
3. Open a new tab
4. Open the same folder
5. Choose a different view
6. Restart

Actual Results:  
Both tabs show the same view.

Expected Results:  
The tabs should have the views originally chosen.
